header: Israel and Judah Will Be Delivered from Their Distress

verse: The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,
“Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, saying, ‘Write for yourself all the words that I have spoken to you in a scroll.

For look, days are coming,’ declares Yahweh, ‘when I will restore the fortunes of my people Israel and Judah,’ says Yahweh, ‘and I will bring them back to the land that I gave to their ancestors and they will take possession of it.’”
Now these are the words that Yahweh spoke concerning Israel and concerning Judah.
